subScenes.name: 初次咨询
subScenes.description: 学生向顾问表达转专业意向

qaPairs.speakerText: Hi, I'd like to talk about switching my major—do you have a minute?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 嗨，我想聊聊转专业的事，你有空吗？

responses.text: Yeah, sure! What major are you thinking of switching to?
responses.text_cn: 当然可以！你想转到哪个专业？

responses.text: Of course! I can help you with that. Tell me more.
responses.text_cn: 当然可以，我来帮你，说说具体情况？

responses.text: Sure.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用礼貌提问开启对话，避免直接开门见山

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm currently in Biology, but I'm really into design and digital media. I feel like I'd be way more motivated if I switched to Graphic Design.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我现在学生物，但我超喜欢设计和数字媒体，转去平面设计我会更有动力。

responses.text: That makes sense—I’ve seen students thrive after switching to something they’re passionate about.
responses.text_cn: 很合理，我见过很多学生转到热爱的专业后表现更好。

responses.text: Yeah, I get it. I’ve always loved art, so this feels right.
responses.text_cn: 我懂，我一直喜欢艺术，所以这感觉对极了。

responses.text: Same here.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用具体兴趣说明动机，避免空泛说‘我喜欢’

subScenes.name: 学分确认
subScenes.description: 询问已修课程能否转学分

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ve taken Calc I and Intro to Psychology—will those count toward the Graphic Design program?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我修过微积分一和心理学导论，这些能算进平面设计专业吗？

responses.text: Calc I definitely counts as a math req, but Psych might only count as an elective—let me check the curriculum map.
responses.text_cn: 微积分一能算数学学分，心理学可能只能当选修，我查下课程图谱。

responses.text: Hmm, Calc I is good, but Psych? Probably not—depends on the department.
responses.text_cn: 微积分一可以，心理学？大概不行，看院系规定。

responses.text: I hope so.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确课程名称，便于顾问���速判断学分归属

qaPairs.speakerText: What if I took a design basics course this summer? Would that help me skip intro classes?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果我暑假修一门设计基础课，能跳过入门课吗？

responses.text: Absolutely! If it’s from an accredited school, we can review it for credit transfer.
responses.text_cn: 当然可以！只要来自认证院校，我们可以审核学分。

responses.text: Maybe—if you send me the syllabus, I can see if it matches our intro course.
responses.text_cn: 有可能，你把课程大纲发我，我看看是否匹配。

responses.text: Cool.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动提出解决方案，展现积极态度

subScenes.name: 申请流程
subScenes.description: 了解转专业申请步骤和截止日期

qaPairs.speakerText: So, what’s the actual process? Do I just fill out a form?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那具体流程是啥？填个表就行吗？

responses.text: Not quite—you need a letter of intent, advisor approval, and to meet with the Design dept chair.
responses.text_cn: 没那么简单，你需要意向信、导师同意，还要见设计系主任。

responses.text: Yeah, just the form—easy peasy!
Tell me what I need to do.

qaPairs.usageNote: 避免假设流程简单，主动询问具体步骤

qaPairs.speakerText: When’s the deadline to apply for next semester?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 下学期转专业的截止日期是什么时候？

responses.text: March 15th—but if you’re switching into a popular major, apply by mid-February to be safe.
responses.text_cn: 3月15号，但热门专业建议2月中旬前提交更稳妥。

responses.text: End of March, I think?
Is it still open?

qaPairs.usageNote: 询问截止日时，主动追问是否建议提前提交

subScenes.name: 后续跟进
subScenes.description: 确认下一步行动与联系方式

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ll send you the syllabus for that design course by Friday—should I email you or submit it online?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我周五把设计课的大纲发给你，是发邮件还是在线提交？

responses.text: Email it to me directly—my address is j.smith@univ.edu. I’ll forward it to the department.
responses.text_cn: 直接发邮件给我，地址是 j.smith@univ.edu，我会转给系里。

responses.text: Just upload it to the portal.
Okay.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确提交方式，避免信息传递出错

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for your help! How should I follow up if I don’t hear back?
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 太感谢你的帮助了！如果没回音我该怎么跟进？

responses.text: No problem! If you haven’t heard in 5 days, just drop by my office hours or send a polite reminder.
responses.text_cn: 不客气！五天没回音，来办公室或发个礼貌提醒就行。

responses.text: Just wait—it takes time.
Got it, thanks!

qaPairs.usageNote: 礼貌询问跟进方式，体现主动性与尊重

subScenes.name: 结束对话
subScenes.description: 礼貌结束咨询并表达感谢

qaPairs.speakerText: Alright, I’ve got everything I need—thanks again for clearing this up!
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 好了，我需要的信息都有了，再次感谢你帮我理清思路！

responses.text: You’re welcome! Good luck with your application—I’m rooting for you!
responses.text_cn: 不客气！祝你申请顺利，我支持你！

responses.text: Sure, no problem.
See you around!

qaPairs.usageNote: 结尾表达感谢+积极期待，留下良好印象

qaPairs.speakerText: I’ll send you that syllabus by Friday and start drafting my letter of intent this weekend.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我周五发你大纲，这周末就开始写转专业意向信。

responses.text: Perfect! I’ll look out for it—and if you need help with the letter, just say the word.
responses.text_cn: 太棒了！我等你发来，需要帮写信随时说。

responses.text: Cool.
Alright, talk later.

qaPairs.usageNote: 主动告知下一步行动，增强对话闭环感
